results.content: Instructor did not spend a lot of time on HTML5 and focused more time on Javascript, also made a lot of mistakes that should have been edited out.
results.content_html: Instructor did not spend a lot of time on HTML5 and focused more time on Javascript, also made a lot of mistakes that should have been edited out.

results.content:
Excellent course!!

The instructor is very knowledgeable about Web Development with HTML5 and CSS3 and is able to present the concepts in a way that is easily understandable. I feel ready to implement the knowledge gained from the course.

I highly recommend this course and the instructor.
